package.name: EasySearchDismissal
package.shortDescription: Dismiss the the search bar by pressing 'Search' on the bottom right of your keyboard even if the search bar is empty.

descriptionlist.description: Dismiss the the search bar by pressing 'Search' on the bottom right of your keyboard even if the search bar is empty.

changelog.change: Pressing 'Search' on the keyboard whilst the search bar is empty now mimics the cancelling the search.
Known bugs: Does not work on Spotlight search.
